hero.title: Sunshine School
hero.subtitle: Welcome to
hero.description: Discover a high-quality education that combines rigorous academic standards with innovative methods to develop creativity and critical thinking.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to provide a comprehensive education that develops the academic and creative skills of our students, preparing them to be curious, committed individuals with an open mind towards continuous learning.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We envision being a leading institution in innovative education, recognized for our commitment to academic excellence and the personal development of each student. We want to be a place where creativity, passion and love for learning are cultivated.

about.title: It's About Hawks
about.description: The Sunshine culture fosters a collaborative and family environment, promoting high ethical values and meaningful learning.

metrics.title: Our Numbers
metrics.description: We have been providing quality education for over 20 years, with a 99% graduation rate and 95% of our students going on to college.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.description: Sunshine School has been a beacon of educational excellence since its founding. Our commitment to nurturing young minds goes beyond traditional academics.

about.title: About Sunshine School
about.content: Sunshine School has been a beacon of educational excellence since its founding. Our commitment to nurturing young minds goes beyond traditional academics.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noQuestions: No questions available at the moment.
